item.title: KaTeX Support
item.description: KaTeX Syntax for Markdown Here’s an example Markdown content: When {{< katex inline >}} a \ne 0 {{< /katex >}}, there are two solutions to {{< katex >}} ax^2 + bx + c = 0 {{< /katex >}} and they are: {{< katex >}} x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a} {{< /katex >}} Output: When \( a \ne 0 \), there are two solutions to \[ ax^2 + bx + c = 0 \] and they are:
